text: Hi, can you help me delete my account?
Sure, I can help with that. I just need your authentication information. Can you please provide me with your username and password?
My email is foo and my password is bar.
Thanks for providing that information. Before we delete your account, I need to authenticate you. Retrieving user token...
Okay. Now, to delete your account, I just need the confirmation to delete it.
Yes, I want to delete it.
Your account has been successfully deleted. How else can I assist you today?
